body_content.explanation: the part of a car that contains some of the controls used for driving and the devices for measuring speed and distance
part of a device, a computer program, etc. that shows information and statistics (= numbers) about how the device, program, etc. is working, which you can use to control it:
examples: The app has a new dashboard to monitor your "digital wellbeing" and limit your app usage.
Learners can check their progress and tailor their courses using the online dashboard.
